name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A
summary: You'll like it if you like Pokémon. Real time battles are fun, lots of interesting ideas in general and megas are cool. But the (surprisingly) good story isn't ambitious.
pros: The charm of Pokémon is not lost at all, very cute and fun
Rogue mega are super cool and well executed
I like the battle ranking system thing
cons: More difficult than a lot of these games but still, the usual issue of overleveled mons that just one tap KO most things
The ending tie off was boring. Wasted potential.
Usual cons of Pokémon. Draggy, graphics stuck behind by 10 years
